Pandoc and Reveal document.write( '' ); Pandoc and Reveal Slideshows from Markdown Gary Dalton 10 July 2015 Fork on GitHub This slideshow is written in Markdown, a plain text format. view the slideshow in markdown Converted into an HTML5, revealjs document using Pandoc. Yes, it really is that easy. Aren't some steps missing? Everything else just happens once you have it set up.

$title$ $for(author)$ $endfor$ $if(reveal.theme)$ $else$ $endif$ $if(highlight-style)$ $else$ $endif$ document.write( '' ); $for(header-includes)$ $header-includes$ $endfor$ $for(include-before)$ $include-before$ $endfor$ $title$ $if(subtitle)$$subtitle$$endif$ $for(author)$$author$$endfor$ $date$ $if(github.user)$ $if(github.logo)$ $else$ Fork on GitHub $endif$ $endif$ $if(toc)$ Outline $toc$ $endif$ $body$ Reveal.initialize({ // Full list of configuration options available here: // https://github.com/hakimel/reveal.js#configuration // let's set some configuration options from YAML controls: $if(reveal.

item.title: Gary Dalton
item.description: I have been coding for many years, mostly in the scientific programming arena. My currently preferred language is Python.

item.title: Main Title
item.description: # This slideshow is written in Markdown, a plain text format. view the slideshow in markdown Converted into an HTML5 document using Pandoc. Pandoc uses a template to convert the Markdown to HTML5. The HTML5 document is automatically formatted for use with and linked to reveal.js by the template. Reveal is a feature-rich javascript library that displays the slideshow. Yes, it really is that easy.

item.title: Pandoc and Reveal
item.description: # ## This slideshow is written in Markdown, a plain text format. view the slideshow in markdown Converted into an HTML5, revealjs document using Pandoc. Yes, it really is that easy. Aren’t some steps missing? Everything else just happens once you have it set up. Pandoc uses a template to convert the Markdown to HTML5. The HTML5 document is automatically formatted for use with and linked to reveal.

item.title: Project Template
item.description: Project name Introduction Give your users an overview of the purpose and function of your project in a paragraph or two (at most). Because sometimes a picture is worth a thousand words, include screenshots when appropriate. Usage Provide a short code snippet (if applicable), or short usage instructions Contributing Give instructions on how to participate in your project patches. Help Explain which communication channels are available to request help. Communication channels with a proven track record are mailing lists, IRC channels, and forums.
